prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Promptbook is suitable for various AI applications, including chatbots, knowledge bases, agents, avatars, translators, and automations. However, it may not be ideal for certain scenarios, such as when extreme precision is required or when working with legacy systems.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
